item.title: Start MongoDB as service
item.description: 1. start MongoDB normally Once you have installed MongoDB on your PC, you can start MongoDB using mongod --dbpath C:\MongoDB\Server\3.6\data\db 2. start MongDB as service remove the existing MongDB service intall the MongoDB as a service start the MongoDB service stop the MongoDB service mongod --remove mongod --dbpath=D:\MongoDB\Server\3.6\data\db --logpath=D:\MongoDB\Server\3.6\logs\log.txt --install net start MongoDB net stop MongoDB When you install or remove MongoDB service to or from you computer, you can add the --serviceName YourServiceName flag after the command to customize the service name as you wish.
